apis.name: List owned runners
apis.description: Get a list of specific runners available to the user.

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: Deprecated: Use type or status instead. The scope of specific runners to show, one of: active, paused, online and offline; showing all runners if none provided

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of runners to show, one of: instance_type, group_type, project_type

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of runners to show, one of: online, offline, stale, and never_contacted. active and paused are also possible values which were deprecated in GitLab 14.8 and will be removed in GitLab 16.0

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether to include only runners that are accepting or ignoring new jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: List of the runner’s tags

apis.name: List all runners
apis.description: Get a list of all runners in the GitLab instance (specific and shared). Access is restricted to users with administrator access.

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: Deprecated: Use type or status instead. The scope of runners to show, one of: specific, shared, active, paused, online and offline; showing all runners if none provided

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of runners to show, one of: instance_type, group_type, project_type

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of runners to show, one of: online, offline, stale, and never_contacted. active and paused are also possible values which were deprecated in GitLab 14.8 and will be removed in GitLab 16.0

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether to include only runners that are accepting or ignoring new jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: List of the runner’s tags

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of a runner

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Deprecated: Use :paused instead. Flag indicating whether the runner is allowed to receive jobs

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the runner should ignore new jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: The list of tags for a runner; put array of tags, that should be finally assigned to a runner

attributes.name: run_untagged
attributes.description: Flag indicating the runner can execute untagged jobs

attributes.name: locked
attributes.description: Flag indicating the runner is locked

attributes.name: access_level
attributes.description: The access_level of the runner; not_protected or ref_protected

attributes.name: maximum_timeout
attributes.description: Maximum timeout set when this runner handles the job

apis.name: List runner’s jobs
apis.description: List jobs that are being processed or were processed by the specified runner. The list of jobs is limited to projects where the user has at least the Reporter role.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Status of the job; one of: running, success, failed, canceled

attributes.name: order_by
attributes.description: Order jobs by id.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Sort jobs in asc or desc order (default: desc). Specify order_by as well, including for id.

apis.name: List project’s runners
apis.description: List all runners available in the project, including from ancestor groups and any allowed shared runners.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: Deprecated: Use type or status instead. The scope of specific runners to show, one of: active, paused, online and offline; showing all runners if none provided

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of runners to show, one of: instance_type, group_type, project_type

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of runners to show, one of: online, offline, stale, and never_contacted. active and paused are also possible values which were deprecated in GitLab 14.8 and will be removed in GitLab 16.0

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether to include only runners that are accepting or ignoring new jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: List of the runner’s tags

apis.name: Enable a runner in project
apis.description: Enable an available specific runner in the project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: runner_id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

apis.name: Disable a runner from project
apis.description: Disable a specific runner from the project. It works only if the project isn’t the only project associated with the specified runner. If so, an error is returned. Use the call to delete a runner instead.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: runner_id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

apis.name: List group’s runners
apis.description: List all runners available in the group as well as its ancestor groups, including any allowed shared runners.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of runners to show, one of: instance_type, group_type, project_type. The project_type value is deprecated and will be removed in GitLab 15.0

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of runners to show, one of: online, offline, stale, and never_contacted. active and paused are also possible values which were deprecated in GitLab 14.8 and will be removed in GitLab 16.0

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether to include only runners that are accepting or ignoring new jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: List of the runner’s tags

apis.name: Register a new runner
apis.description: Register a new runner for the instance.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: Registration token

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Runner’s description

attributes.name: info
attributes.description: Runner’s metadata. You can include name, version, revision, platform, and architecture, but only version is displayed in the Admin Area of the UI

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Deprecated: Use :paused instead. Whether the runner is allowed to receive jobs

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether the runner should ignore new jobs

attributes.name: locked
attributes.description: Whether the runner should be locked for current project

attributes.name: run_untagged
attributes.description: Whether the runner should handle untagged jobs

attributes.name: tag_list
attributes.description: List of runner’s tags

attributes.name: access_level
attributes.description: The access_level of the runner; not_protected or ref_protected

attributes.name: maximum_timeout
attributes.description: Maximum timeout set when this runner handles the job

attributes.name: maintainer_note
attributes.description: Deprecated, see maintenance_note

attributes.name: maintenance_note
attributes.description: Free-form maintenance notes for the runner (1024 characters)

apis.name: Delete a runner by ID
apis.description: To delete the runner by ID, use your access token with the runner’s ID:

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner. The ID is visible in the UI under Settings > CI/CD. Expand Runners, and below the Remove Runner button is an ID preceded by the pound sign, for example, #6.

apis.name: Delete a runner by authentication token
apis.description: To delete the runner by using its authentication token:

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: The runner’s authentication token.

apis.name: Verify authentication for a registered runner
apis.description: Validates authentication credentials for a registered runner.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: Runner’s authentication token.

apis.name: Reset instance’s runner registration token
apis.description: Resets the runner registration token for the GitLab instance.

apis.name: Reset project’s runner registration token
apis.description: Resets the runner registration token for a project.

apis.name: Reset group’s runner registration token
apis.description: Resets the runner registration token for a group.

apis.name: Reset runner’s authentication token by using the runner ID
apis.description: Resets the runner’s authentication token by using its runner ID.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a runner

apis.name: Reset runner’s authentication token by using the current token
apis.description: Resets the runner’s authentication token by using the current token’s value as an input.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: The current token of the runner
